welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rowley Regis, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
